name: Dotfiles
body:
# .dotfiles for going to the club and getting drank on with them women

too many kompooters, have decided to sync



## install

`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.ackrc ~/.ackrc`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.emacs ~/.emacs`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.gemrc ~/.gemrc`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.git.scmbrc ~/.git.scmbrc`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.gitconfig ~/.gitconfig`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.gitignore ~/.gitignore`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.gitignore_global ~/.gitignore_global`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.gitmodules ~/.gitmodules`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.hgignore_global ~/.hgignore_global`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.hgrc ~/.hgrc`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.pentadactylrc ~/.pentadactylrc`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.tmux.conf ~/.tmux.conf`




## vim

`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/.dotfiles/vim/vimrc ~/.vimrc`



## qs install

`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/quicksilver/Actions ~/Library/Application\ Support/Quicksilver/Actions`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/quicksilver/Shelves ~/Library/Application\ Support/Quicksilver/Shelves`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/quicksilver/Plugins ~/Library/Application\ Support/Quicksilver/Plugins`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/quicksilver/Caches ~/Library/Application\ Support/Quicksilver/Caches`
`ln -s ~/code_and_projects/dotfiles/quicksilver/Triggers.plist ~/Library/Application\ Support/Quicksilver/Triggers.plist`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
